description:
euca-run-instances -k test -t ms1.tiny ami-xxxx

If I pass invalid instance type to the run instance command, it gives error message as 
"ms1.tiny: ms1.tiny: Unknown instance type: %s"

Expected Result: It should give error messsage something like
"Invalid: Unknown instance type : ms1.tiny"
title: RunInstances: Invalid instance type gives improper error message

comments.content:
euca-run-instances -k test -t ms1.tiny ami-xxxx

If I pass invalid instance type to the run instance command, it gives error message as 
"ms1.tiny: ms1.tiny: Unknown instance type: %s"

Expected Result: It should give error messsage something like
"Invalid: Unknown instance type : ms1.tiny"
